name: DataTransferItem.kind
description: The read-only DataTransferItem.kind property returns a DataTransferItem representing the drag data item kind: some text or some file.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'kind' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'kind' in the 'HTML 5.1' specification.
